Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.stats

Interface Summary
StatisticalActivityService Service interface for Activity Statistics.
StatisticalActivityServiceLocal Local interface.
StatisticalFinancesService Service interface for Finances Statistics.
StatisticalFinancesServiceLocal Local interface.
StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsService Service interface for Key Developments Statistics.
StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsServiceLocal Local interface.
StatisticalService Service interface for common Statistics.
StatisticalServiceLocal Local interface.
StatisticalTaxesService Service interface for Taxes Statistics.
StatisticalTaxesServiceLocal Local interface.
 

Class Summary
HistogramDTOFactory This class takes a simple list with data, retrieved straight from a database query, and uses it to create a StatisticalResultDTO value object for the creation of a Histogram.
StatisticalActivityServiceImpl An implementation of the StatisticalActivityService interface; subclasses StatisticalService.
StatisticalActivityServiceSecurity Security implementation for StatisticalActivityService
StatisticalFinancesServiceImpl implementation of the StatisticalFinancesService.
StatisticalFinancesServiceSecurity Security implementation for StatisticalFinancesService
StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsServiceImpl An implementation of the StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsService interface; subclasses StatisticalService.
StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsServiceSecurity  
StatisticalResultDTO this class is the base value object containing the statistical data to be shown in the jsp.
StatisticalResultDTO.ResourceKey static innner class defining the Key Object for a language resouce bundle.
StatisticalServiceImpl general implementation of StatisticalService; contains general methods for all child classes.
StatisticalServiceSecurity Security implementation for StatisticalService
StatisticalTaxesServiceImpl implementation of the StatisticalTaxesService.
StatisticalTaxesServiceSecurity Security implementation for StatisticalTaxesService
 

Enum Summary
HistogramDTOFactory.LastRowHeaderPrefix and enum determining the prefix for the label of the last bar in the graph.
StatisticalResultDTO.GraphType enum indicating the graph type.
StatisticalResultDTO.MultiGraph an enum indicating how one table should be split up into multiple graphs.
StatisticalResultDTO.TableToGraph This enum determines which orientation is used when the table is converted to a graph.
StatisticalService.TableType TableType, always comparing two periods in two different columns.
StatisticalTaxesService.PaidOrNot Allows the user to choose between statistics about taxes paid, taxes not paid, or both.
